name: Family Build - Craft Survival
description:
Start a serene adventure where you don’t need to fight against wild beasts or alien invaders – just collect resources and craft needed materials for your house! Create a family and have some pet animals – you’d be surprised with numerous possibilities when you are not disturbed by something 9ore someone) attempting to eat you constantly!
Family Build - Craft Survival features:
• Numerous craftable objects and decorations for your house
• Various unusual pets to take care of
• Diverse opportunities for time spending – you can build, explore or go fishing if you want to!
• Calm atmosphere of a peaceful forest
If you need a tranquil and serene experience – this game is made just for you! Download Family Build - Craft Survival and have a great time creating the house you always dreamed of!
